recipe.preparation: Mix ingredients together thoroughly before forming spoonfuls of batter onto a nonstick/buttered/parchmented cookie sheet.  Cook in 350F oven for 10 minutes or until they brown.
recipe.name: Oatmeal Cookies
recipe.notes: My gramps used to make this extraordinary cookies which probably had in no small part something to do with  my girth growing  up.  I consider them at this point a "lost" recipe worth re-engineering, and there's very few of  those currently under development  these days.  As such, I'm going to collect a dozen or so damned recipes  before I find "The One" and you'll just hafta suffer until  then.  My mom suffers me to believe that it was just  "off a box of oatmeal" but there was something special in Gramps' recipe that I  haven't quite found yet in any of  the recipes I've tried.
